Attribute.Name: ItemID
Attribute.Description: Item Id of the item for which inventory value has to be loaded.

Attribute.Name: OrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: Organization Code of the organization maintaining the inventory.

Attribute.Name: ProductClass
Attribute.Description: Product Class of the item for which inventory value has to be loaded.

Attribute.Name: ShipNode
Attribute.Description: Ship Node for which inventory value has to be adjusted.

Attribute.Name: UnitOfMeasure
Attribute.Description: Unit Of Measure of the item for which inventory value has to be loaded.

Attribute.Name: AverageCost
Attribute.Description: Average Cost of the item at the shipnode.

Attribute.Name: InventoryValue
Attribute.Description: Inventory Value of the item at the shipnode.

Attribute.Name: Quantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity for which inventory value has to be loaded. This should be a equal to the current on-hand inventory for the item/shipnode.

Attribute.Name: ShipNode
Attribute.Description: Ship Node for which inventory value has to be loaded.
